articles.content: People with vitiligo usually lose skin pigment in patches. The depigmented, white patches may spread all over the body, or they may appear only in one area. This loss of pigmentation can happen in an… [+11459 chars]

articles.title: These are the advantages of exercising in a group for those over 65 - D1SoftballNews.com
articles.description: No one is exempt from doing physical exercise. Regular physical activity is essential to prevent and help manage heart disease, type 2 diabetes and cancer, as well as to reduce symptoms of depression and anxiety, slow cognitive decline, improve memory and boo…
